gurmukhi: ਮੁਨ ਮਨ ੳੁਦਾਰ ॥ ਗੁਨ ਗਨ ਅਪਾਰ ॥ ਹਰਿ ਭਗਤਿ ਲੀਨ ॥ ਹਰਿ ਕੋ ਅਧੀਨ ॥੨੧੩॥
transliteration: Mounndman Udaar|| Goun Gad Apaar|| Har(i) Bhagad(i) Leen|| Har(i) Ko Adheen||213||
translation: The generous sage, full of innumerable attributes, was absorbed in the devotion of the Lord and was under the submission of the Lord.213.

gurmukhi: ਤਜਿ ਰਾਜ ਭੋਗ ॥ ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਜੋਗ ॥ ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਰਾੲਿ ॥ ਹਰਿ ਭਗਤ ਭਾੲਿ ॥੨੧੪॥
transliteration: Taj(i) Raaj Bhog|| Sannyaas Jog|| Sannyaas Jog|| Har(i) Bhagad Bhaae||214||
translation: Forsaking the royal enjoyments that king of Yogis had adopted Sannyas and Yoga for the devotion and desire of meeting the Lord.214.

gurmukhi: ਮੁਖ ਛਬਿ ਅਪਾਰ ॥ ਪੂਰਣ ਵਤਾਰ ॥ ਖੜਗੰ ਅਸੇਖ ॥ ਬਿੱਦਿਅਾ ਬਿਸੇਖ ॥੨੧੫॥
transliteration: Moukh Chhab(i) Apaar|| Pooran Vataar|| Khadagadg Asekh|| Biddiaa Bisekh||215||
translation: The beauty of the face of that perfect incarnation was enormous; he was sharp like dagger and was also skilful in many prominent sciences.215.

gurmukhi: ਸੁੰਦਰ ਸਰੂਪ ॥ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਅਨੂਪ ॥ ਅਾਭਾ ਅਪਾਰ ॥ ਮੁਨ ਮਨ ੳੁਦਾਰ ॥੨੧੬॥
transliteration: Soundar Daroop|| Mahimaa Anoop|| Aabhaa Apaar|| Mounndman Udaar||216||
translation: That charming sage had unique greatness, unlimited glory and generous mind.216.

gurmukhi: ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਦੇਵ ॥ ਗੁਨ ਗਨ ਅਭੇਵ ॥ ਅਬਿਯਕਤ ਰੂਪ ॥ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਅਨੂਪ ॥੨੧੭॥
transliteration: Sannyaas Dev|| Goun Gad Abhev|| Abiyakat Roop|| Mahimaa Anoop||217||
translation: He was a god for Sannyasis and for the virtuous people he was mysterious, unmanifested and of unparalleled greatness.217.

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਸੁਭ ਸੁਭਾਵ ॥ ਅਤਿਭੁਤ ਪ੍ਰਭਾਵ ॥ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਅਪਾਰ ॥ ਗੁਨ ਗਨ ੳੁਦਾਰ ॥
transliteration: Sabh Soubh Soubhaav|| At(i) Bhout Prahaav|| Mahimaa Apaar|| Goun Gad Udaar||218||
translation: His temperament was auspicious, the impact marvelous and the greatness unlimited.218.

gurmukhi: ਤਹ ਸੁਰਥ ਰਾਜ ॥ ਸੰਪਤ ਸਮਾਜ ॥ ਪੂਜੰਤ ਚੰਡ ॥ ਨਿਸਦਿਨ ਅਖੰਡ ॥੨੧੯॥
transliteration: Tab Surath Raaj|| Sanpat Samaaj|| Poojant Channd|| Nisdin Akhannd||219||
translation: There was a king name Surath there who was attached with his assets and society; who worshipped Chandi uninterruptedly.219.

gurmukhi: ਨ੍ਰਿਪ ਅਤਿ ਪ੍ਰਚੰਡ ॥ ਸਭ ਬਿਧ ਅਖੰਡ ॥ ਸਿਲ ਸਿਤ ਪ੍ਰਬੀਨ ॥ ਦੇਵੀ ਅਧੀਨ ॥੨੨੦॥
transliteration: Nrip At(i) Prachanndd|| Sabh Bidh Akhannd|| Sil Sit Prabeen|| Devi Adheen||220||
translation: The king, who was extremely powerful and had complete control of his kingdom, was skilful in all the sciences and was under the submission of the goddess.220.

gurmukhi: ਨਿਸ ਦਿਨ ਭਵਾਨ ॥ ਸੇਵਤ ਨਿਧਾਨ ॥ ਕਰਿ ੲੇਕ ਅਾਸ ॥ ਨਿਸ ਦਿਨ ੳੁਦਾਸ ॥੨੨੧॥
transliteration: Nis Din Bhavaan|| Sevat Nidhaan|| Kar(i) Ek Aas|| Nis Din Udaas|| 221||
translation: He served the goddess Bhavani night and day and remained unattached with only one desire in his mind.221.

gurmukhi: ਦੁਰਗਾ ਪੁਜੰਤ ॥ ਨਿਤਪ੍ਰਤਿ ਮਹੰਤ ॥ ਬਹੁ ਬਿਧ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਰ ॥ ਸੇਵਤ ਸਵਾਰ ॥੨੨੨॥
transliteration: Durgad Pujant|| Nitprat(i) Mahant|| Bahu Bidh Prakaar|| Sevat Savaar||222||
translation: He used to worship Durga always in various ways and made offerings.222.

gurmukhi: ਅਤਿ ਗੁਨਿ ਨਿਧਾਨ ॥ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਮਹਾਨ ॥ ਅਤਿ ਬਿਮਲ ਅੰਗ ॥ ਲਖਿ ਲਜਤ ਗੰਗ ॥੨੨੩॥
transliteration: At(i) Goun(i) Nidhaan|| Mahimaa Mahaan|| At(i) Bimal An|| Lakh(i) Lajat Gan||223||
translation: That king was enromusly praiseworthy, treasure of virtues and had such a pure body that on seeing him, even the ganges felt shy.223.

gurmukhi: ਤਿਹ ਨਿਰਖ ਦੱਤ ॥ ਅਤਿ ਬਿਮਲ ਮੱਤਿ ॥ ਅਨਖੰਡ ਜੋਤ ॥ ਜਨ ਭਿਓ ੳੁਦੋਤ ॥੨੨੪॥
transliteration: Tih Nirakh Datt|| At(i) Bimal Matt(i)|| Ankhanndjot|| Jan Bhio Udot||224||
translation: Seeing him, Dutt became extremely pure in intellect and completely lustrous.224.

gurmukhi: ਝਮਕੰਤ ਅੰਗ ॥ ਲਖਿ ਲਜਤ ਗੰਗ ॥ ਅਤਿ ਗੁਨ ਨਿਧਾਨ ॥ ਮਹਿਮਾ ਮਹਾਨ ॥੨੨੫॥
transliteration: Jhamkant An|| Lakh(i) Lajat Gadg|| At(i) Goun Nidhaan|| Mahimaa Mahaan||225||
translation: Seeing his limbs, even Ganges became shy, because he was enormously praiseworthy and a treasure of virtues.225.

gurmukhi: ਅਨਭਵ ਪ੍ਰਕਾਸ਼ ॥ ਨਿਸਦਿਨ ੳੁਦਾਸ ॥ ਅਤਿਭੁਤ ਸੁਭਾਵ ॥ ਸੰਨਯਾਸ ਰਾਵ ॥੨੨੬॥
transliteration: Anbhav Prakaadh|| Nisdin Udaas|| At(i)bhout Soubhaav|| Sannyaas Raav||226||
translation: The sage saw that he was bright like light, ever unattached and a king of Sannyasis with marvelous temperament.226.
